Package com.seailz.discordjv.model.component

Class ActionRow

java.lang.Object
com.seailz.discordjv.model.component.ActionRow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Compilerable, Component, DisplayComponent
public class ActionRow extends Object implements DisplayComponent
Represents a component that is used to layout other RawComponents, such as SelectMenus
Since:
1.0
Author:
Seailz
